cards.title: Clinical Psychology
cards.description: Through clinical psychology, you will be able to embark on a journey of personal discovery and growth. Through an ethical and responsible approach, we will be able to work through deep personal experiences and to build a renewed and empowered sense of self, so you can lead a happier life.

cards.title: Performance Psychology
cards.description: Inspired in my work with high-performance individuals (in sports, tech or finance), performance psychology aims you becoming the best version of yourself. If you are aware of your abilities and want to pursue personal and professional excellence, this is the place for you.

cards.title: Psychology for teams and companies
cards.description: This service is tailored to groups of people who know they have to set themselves apart in an increasingly competitive market. Through motivational speaking or designed workshops, the goal is to help your team or company develop the strategies necessary to get to the next level.

about.title: About
about.name: Dr. Miguel Sá
about.subtitle: CLINICAL and PERFORMANCE | PSYCHOLOGIST and LECTURER
about.bio1: Born in Portugal in 1989, I am a clinical and performance psychologist, having done my Bachelor in Psychological Sciences and my Master’s Degree in Clinical Psychology in ISPA University Institute, one of the oldest and most prestigious Psychology Schools in Portugal.
about.bio2: After graduating in 2013, I have been pursuing my professional passions, in which I am actively involved: clinical psychology, performance psychology, and teaching, which I currently do at Curtin University Malaysia.
about.bio3: My work as a clinical and performance psychologist is the result of over a decade of experience learning from different references in the field, and from the opportunity to learn and work in multicultural settings. My main goal as a therapist is to help people develop a deeper understanding of who they are, to be able to face their inner conflicts and challenges, and to help them develop healthier strategies so they can lead happier and more meaningful lives.
about.cta: Are you ready to begin the process of change?

academic.1: Postgraduation in Sport and Health Psychology - ISPA (2016)
academic.2: PhD in Clinical Psychology - Curtin University (2025) - to be started

interventionsPage.title: How can psychology help you?
interventionsPage.description: Psychology is a science that studies human behavior and mental processes, offering tools for self-knowledge, emotional well-being, and personal development. With professional support, you can identify and transform patterns, thoughts, and behaviors that may be affecting your life.

bullets.title: Emotional Well-being
bullets.text: Learn how to manage stress, anxiety and other emotions that may be affecting your daily life.

bullets.title: Self-knowledge and Personal Growth
bullets.text: Discover strengths, areas of improvement and strategies to reach your best version.

bullets.title: Academic and Professional Success
bullets.text: Develop study, time management and decision-making skills to achieve your goals.

bullets.title: Healthy Relationships
bullets.text: Learn to communicate effectively and build positive relationships in all areas of your life.

bullets.title: Sports Performance
bullets.text: Improve your concentration, confidence and resilience to optimise your performance in competitions.

interventionsPage.valuesText: Kindness, compassion, openness, and inclusion. That is the true value of the science of therapeutic change and human growth. Diversity and individual differences in the many ways people live and experience life are truly valued as part of the human experience. And your values, culture, ethnicity, sexual orientation, and faith will always be respected. There can be no growth in the therapeutic process without understanding and valuing what makes you unique!
